request.description:
This method is used to receive a JWT token for further access

#### Response Example
```
{
"token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwOlwvXC9wcjAzLXNpc3QtZGlzdHJpYnVpZG9zLnRlc3RcL2FwaVwvbG9naW4iLCJpYXQiOjE2MzcxMjc2NjIsImV4cCI6MTYzNzEzMTI2MiwibmJmIjoxNjM3MTI3NjYyLCJqdGkiOiJmZFBJUDhXNUlQcHJ0MFlGIiwic3ViIjoxLCJwcnYiOiIyM2JkNWM4OTQ5ZjYwMGFkYjM5ZTcwMWM0MDA4NzJkYjdhNTk3NmY3In0.XzIICXypJVqV_GPdkC5iIkoygUe7LDSWC69z20JoAF4",
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "expires_in": 3600
}
```

This method is used to create a user for further use

#### Response Example
```
{
"user": {
        "name": "Arthur Ydalgo",
        "email": "arthur_email@gmail.com",
        "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:24:00.000000Z",
        "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:24:00.000000Z",
        "id": 2
    },
    "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwOlwvXC9wcjAzLXNpc3QtZGlzdHJpYnVpZG9zLnRlc3RcL2FwaVwvcmVnaXN0ZXIiLCJpYXQiOjE2MzcxMzAyNDAsImV4cCI6MTYzNzEzMzg0MCwibmJmIjoxNjM3MTMwMjQwLCJqdGkiOiJoQlpLTmhoNWJic2NWS040Iiwic3ViIjoyLCJwcnYiOiIyM2JkNWM4OTQ5ZjYwMGFkYjM5ZTcwMWM0MDA4NzJkYjdhNTk3NmY3In0.GNjJezIqjyRjA9TPh_VgXUOfHDv3DUTVa2SWtMg4GUw",
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "expires_in": 3600,
    "message": "CREATED"
}
```

This method is used to create a listing

#### Response Example
```
{
    "user_id": 1,
    "name": "Lista de Compras",
    "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:17:57.000000Z",
    "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:17:57.000000Z",
    "id": 12
}
```

This method is used to create a listing

#### Response Example
```
{
    "user_id": 1,
    "name": "Lista de Compras",
    "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:17:57.000000Z",
    "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:17:57.000000Z",
    "id": 12
}
```

This method is used to list the listings

#### Response Example 
```
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "user_id": 1,
        "name": "Lista de Compras",
        "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z",
        "listing_items_count": 0
    }
]
```

This method is used to retrieve a specific listing, along with it's items
#### Response Example
```
{
    "id": 1,
    "user_id": 1,
    "name": "Lista de Compras",
    "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z",
    "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z",
    "listing_items": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "listing_id": 1,
            "text": "Eggs",
            "checked": null,
            "created_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2021-11-17T06:05:48.000000Z"
        }
    ]
}
```

This method is used to delete a listing. The listing items will also be deleted. The response will be the deleted listing.

#### Response Example
```
{
    "id": 2,
    "user_id": 1,
    "name": "a",
    "created_at": null,
    "updated_at": null,
    "listing_items_count": 0
}
```
